channel.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me
channel.description: So hello all. I just "made" my first server i took source+client which is the Extinctionv2 Release By Poanizer I change all ip from 127.0.0.0 to my no ip i create i made a webclient too. Which all need to work perfectly then i try login from my other computer from webclient and it wont work. Then i upload my Client file to dropbox download it from the other computer still wont work in webclient, Client it stuck on 1% but on this computer work fine i change the ip in Loader.java,Gamestub.java,Client.java Btw its 667 version and if can someone tell me how to changestats item and add models it would be very help Btw i crate the client with jarmaker This is my webclient link:http://projectinfinty.netau.net/ Thanks for helpers My skype is:Infintyprox123 :)

item.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

If you need help with portforwarding , send me a pm.

Read full topic
item.source: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me

item.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

I believe you mean you changed the IP from 127.0.0.1, as that’s the actual localhost IP.

Are you sure you actually set up your no-ip correctly? As in, even you can connect to the ip from there? This simply has to be a port-forwarding issue. If you get to frustrated you can always just try out hamachi to see if it’s just a client issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me

item.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me
item.dc:creator: @Flipp Flipp
item.description:
@Flipp wrote:

Yes, be sure you port-forwarded correctly.

If you are hosting with uTorrent and No-Ip (as you said above), make sure you set both of those up correctly

Read full topic
item.source: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me

item.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me

item.description:
@Thoby wrote:

Are you sure you port-forwarded?

item.title: Why pepole cannot connect my server expect me
item.dc:creator: @Infintyx123 Infintyx123
item.description:
@Infintyx123 wrote:

So hello all.
I just “made” my first server i took source+client which is the Extinctionv2 Release By Poanizer
I change all ip from 127.0.0.0 to my no ip i create i made a webclient too.
Which all need to work perfectly then i try login from my other computer from webclient and it wont work.
Then i upload my Client file to dropbox download it from the other computer still wont work in webclient,
Client it stuck on 1% but on this computer work fine i change the ip in Loader.java,Gamestub.java,Client.java
Btw its 667 version and if can someone tell me how to changestats item and add models it would be very help
Btw i crate the client with jarmaker
This is my webclient link:http://projectinfinty.netau.net/
Thanks for helpers
My skype is:Infintyprox123
